mapper.insert: INSERT INTO customer_area_distribute (company_id,city_id,num,create_time,target_date) SELECT rscr.company_info_id as company_id, ifnull( rcd.city_id,-1) as city_id, count( 1 ) as num, now() as create_time, #{targetDate} as target_date FROM replay_store_customer_rela rscr LEFT JOIN replay_customer rc ON rc.customer_id = rscr.customer_id LEFT JOIN replay_customer_detail rcd ON rcd.customer_id = rscr.customer_id WHERE rc.check_state = 1 AND DATE_FORMAT( rc.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d' ) <= #{targetDate} GROUP BY rcd.city_id, rscr.company_info_id;

INSERT INTO customer_area_distribute (company_id,city_id,num,create_time,target_date) SELECT 0 as company_id, ifnull( rcd.city_id,-1) as city_id, count( 1 ) as num, now() as create_time, #{targetDate} as target_date FROM replay_customer rc LEFT JOIN replay_customer_detail rcd ON rcd.customer_id = rc.customer_id WHERE rc.check_state = 1 AND DATE_FORMAT( rc.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d' ) <= #{targetDate} GROUP BY rcd.city_id;
mapper.select: SELECT SUM(num) as num, city_id AS cityId FROM customer_area_distribute WHERE target_date = #{date} AND company_id = #{companyId} group by city_id,create_time
